caption: Orchestrator
name: orchestrator
description: The orhcestrator object describes a specific cluster, which is a source of events. Container orchestration automates the deployment, management, scaling, and networking of containers.

uid.description: The container unique identifier. For example: a3bf90e006b2.

runtime.description: The runtime used to run the containers inside the cluster, such as Docker, containerd, CRI-O, podman.

type.description: The type of orchestrator managing the containers, such as ECS, EKS, K8s, OpenShift, or others.

creation_timestamp.description: The time the cluster was created.

labels.description: The array of labels defined in the cluster

annotations.description: The array of annotations of the cluster.

network_subnet.description: The CIDR networks used by the cluster.

images.description: The container images used the containers inside the cluster.
